title: Remodeled 2 Bedroom, 1 Month Free!!! AVL 8/26 V205
posting_body: ['Large 2 Bed 1 Bath, 1 Mo Free, New Remodel!', 'Property Address', '407 Vernon Street | Unit 205 | Oakland, CA 94610', 'Available:', '08/26/2022', 'Offered By', 'Kasa Properties', 'Description', 'Photos are pre-remodel to give an idea of the space.', '1 Mo Free on leases starting before 9/10!', 'Schedule a tour HERE: <URL>', 'A cozy 15-unit building, located in a quiet neighborhood, an easy walk to Lake Merritt, Whole Foods, BART, and downtown Oakland.', 'This unit is undergoing a remodel including new cabinets, countertops, flooring, in unit washer/dryer, etc!', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Bedrooms: 2 Bed', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Parking: Garage (See Details Below)', 'Lease Duration: to July 31, 2023', 'Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs Welcome (See Details Below)', 'Laundry: Shared, Coin Operated', 'Floor: 2nd', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Range / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Washer/Dryer', 'Microwave', 'Cable-ready', 'Intercom system', 'Hardwood floor', 'Tile floor', 'Granite countertop', 'BUILDING FEATURES', 'Storage available for rent', 'Off-street Parking and full garages', 'LEASE TERMS', 'Pet: $75-100 added to the base month per pet', 'Water and garbage are passed through based on occupancy and usage', 'Attached garage parking is available for an additional fee', 'Smoking is not permitted on the premises.', "NOTE: The City of Oakland's Fair Chance Housing Ordinance requires that rental housing providers display this notice to applicants - <URL> Ordinance.Tenant-Notice.10.5.2020.pdf", 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/1.0BA', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $3,295.00', 'Available:', '08/26/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $6,590.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
